content:
Learn about Firebase: Explore
sample Firebase apps
. Explore the open source code in GitHub for
Node.js
,
Java
,
and
Python
. Read
Admin SDK
-related blog posts
by one of
the creators of the
Admin SDK
. For example:
Accessing Firestore and Firebase through a proxy server
. Add Firebase features to your app: Write a serverless backend with
Cloud Functions
. Store info with
Realtime Database
or blob data with
Cloud Storage
. Receive notifications with
Cloud Messaging
. Send feedback
